message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.DL

The paper discusses the need for an integrated infrastructure to support both high-performance computing and high-throughput computing for experimental science facilities. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science (cs.CE), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), Software Engineering (cs.SE), and Digital Libraries (cs.DL).
